verses.verse: Now the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> Jonah<WH3124> the son<WH1121> of Amittai,<WH573> saying,<WH559>
Arise, <WH6965> go<WH1980> to<WH413> Nineveh,<WH5210> that great<WH1419> city,<WH5892> and cry<WH7121> against<WH5921> it; for<WH3588> their wickedness<WH7451> is come up<WH5927> before<WH6440> me.

But Jonah<WH3124> rose up<WH6965> to flee<WH1272> unto Tarshish<WH8659> from the presence<WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD,<WH3068> and went down<WH3381> to Joppa;<WH3305> and he found<WH4672> a ship<WH591> going<WH935> to Tarshish:<WH8659> so he paid<WH5414> the fare<WH7939> thereof, and went down<WH3381> into it, to go<WH935> with<WH5973> them unto Tarshish<WH8659> from the presence<WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD.<WH3068>

But the LORD<WH3068> sent out<WH2904> a great<WH1419> wind<WH7307> into<WH413> the sea,<WH3220> and there was<WH1961> a mighty<WH1419> tempest<WH5591> in the sea,<WH3220> so that the ship<WH591> was like<WH2803> to be broken.<WH7665>

Then the mariners<WH4419> were afraid,<WH3372> and cried<WH2199> every man<WH376> unto<WH413> his god,<WH430> and cast forth<WH2904> <WH853> the wares<WH3627> that<WH834> were in the ship<WH591> into<WH413> the sea,<WH3220> to lighten<WH7043> it of<WH4480> <WH5921> them. But Jonah<WH3124> was gone down<WH3381> into<WH413> the sides<WH3411> of the ship;<WH5600> and he lay,<WH7901> and was fast asleep.<WH7290>

So the shipmaster<WH7227> <WH2259> came<WH7126> to<WH413> him, and said<WH559> unto him, What<WH4100> meanest thou, O sleeper?<WH7290> arise,<WH6965> call<WH7121> upon<WH413> thy God,<WH430> if so be<WH194> that God<WH430> will think<WH6245> upon us, that we perish<WH6> not.<WH3808>

And they said<WH559> every one<WH376> to<WH413> his fellow,<WH7453> Come,<WH1980> and let us cast<WH5307> lots,<WH1486> that we may know<WH3045> for whose cause<WH7945> <WH4310> this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> is upon us. So they cast<WH5307> lots,<WH1486> and the lot<WH1486> fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> Jonah.<WH3124>

Then said<WH559> they unto<WH413> him, Tell<WH5046> us, we pray thee,<WH4994> for whose cause<WH834> <WH4310> this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> is upon us; What<WH4100> is thine occupation?<WH4399> and whence<WH4480> <WH370> comest<WH935> thou? what<WH4100> is thy country?<WH776> and of what<WH335> <WH4480> <WH2088> people<WH5971> art thou?<WH859>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I<WH595> am a Hebrew;<WH5680> and I<WH589> fear<WH3372> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of heaven,<WH8064> which<WH834> hath made<WH6213> <WH853> the sea<WH3220> and the dry<WH3004> land.

Then were the men<WH376> exceedingly<WH1419> afraid,<WH3372> <WH3374> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Why<WH4100> hast thou done<WH6213> this?<WH2063> For<WH3588> the men<WH376> knew<WH3045> that<WH3588> he<WH1931> fled<WH1272> from the presence<WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD,<WH3068> because<WH3588> he had told<WH5046> them.

Then said<WH559> they unto<WH413> him, What<WH4100> shall we do<WH6213> unto thee, that the sea<WH3220> may be calm<WH8367> unto<WH4480> <WH5921> us? for<WH3588> the sea<WH3220> wrought,<WH1980> and was tempestuous.<WH5590>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Take me up,<WH5375> and cast me forth<WH2904> into<WH413> the sea;<WH3220> so shall the sea<WH3220> be calm<WH8367> unto<WH4480> <WH5921> you: for<WH3588> I<WH589> know<WH3045> that<WH3588> for my sake<WH7945> this<WH2088> great<WH1419> tempest<WH5591> is upon<WH5921> you.

Nevertheless the men<WH376> rowed<WH2864> hard to bring<WH7725> it to<WH413> the land;<WH3004> but they could<WH3201> not:<WH3808> for<WH3588> the sea<WH3220> wrought,<WH1980> and was tempestuous<WH5590> against<WH5921> them.

Wherefore they cried<WH7121> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> We beseech thee,<WH4994> O LORD,<WH3068> we beseech thee,<WH577> let us not<WH408> perish<WH6> for this<WH2088> man's<WH376> life,<WH5315> and lay<WH5414> not<WH408> upon<WH5921> us innocent<WH5355> blood:<WH1818> for<WH3588> thou,<WH859> O LORD,<WH3068> hast done<WH6213> as<WH834> it pleased<WH2654> thee.
So they took up<WH5375> <WH853> Jonah,<WH3124> and cast him forth<WH2904> into<WH413> the sea:<WH3220> and the sea<WH3220> ceased<WH5975> from her raging.<WH4480> <WH2197>
Then the men<WH376> feared<WH3372> <WH3374> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> exceedingly,<WH1419> and offered<WH2076> a sacrifice<WH2077> unto the LORD,<WH3068> and made<WH5087> vows.<WH5088>

Now the LORD<WH3068> had prepared<WH4487> a great<WH1419> fish<WH1709> to swallow up<WH1104> <WH853> Jonah.<WH3124> And Jonah<WH3124> was<WH1961> in the belly<WH4578> of the fish<WH1709> three<WH7969> days<WH3117> and three<WH7969> nights.<WH3915>
